summary: Sports stats tracking app with a Straight Shot Stats tab featuring a Straight Shot Trend Graph (candlestick chart with trend line).

existing_features.title: In StraightShotTrendChart.tsx, change the legend label for the candlestick series from 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)'. No other changes to this file or any other file.

new_feature_requests.summary: Rename legend label from 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)' in the Straight Shot Trend Graph only

projectName: Rename legend label 'Candle (day)' to 'Shots (day)' in Straight Shot Trend Graph
